'''Harama''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|The broad-shouldered aumaua at the center of the huddle takes a cautious step back. His gaze never breaks from the tribesmen who have him surrounded, and his hands never stray far from his weapons.}}
Harama and Maia are old friends, dating back to their service on ''The Flying Buttress''. Although there are still embers of romance between the two of them, they are both loyal servants of the homeland. Harama is currently engaged by Grand Secretary Atsura as a spy and assassin at [Tikawara](/tikawara/), employing his talents and easy going nature to create a network of informants among the Huana.
